Title: School Reunion
Plot:
Location: Deffry Vale High School, London, England, Earth 
Date: 2007 
Enemies: The Krillitanes 

There are strange goings-on at a comprehensive school - UFOs, over-intelligent children, and odd-tasting school dinners. This attracts the attention of the Tenth Doctor, Rose and Mickey Smith, as well as a couple of old friends?
ParentalRatingReason: PG Some scenes may scare very young children
GuestStars: Noel Clarke, Elisabeth Sladen, John Leeson, Eugene Washington, Caroline Berry, Rod Arthur, Clem Tibber, Benjamin Smith, Anthony Stewart Head, Heather Cameron, Lucinda Dryzek, Joe Pickley
